name: Journey To Love (KAGSme)
description:
This game was produced as part of the Brains Eden 2018 Game Jam where the theme was "unreliable". The game follows two characters as they help each other get their barely functioning van to the beach before the sun sets.

The game is 2 player co-op only and it is recommended that players use 2 gamepads to control and play the game.

Credits (Team Void):

  • Linda Stenback - Design
  • Rob Jones - Art
  • Euan Macqueen - Sound FX and Music
  • Jan Riebe - Programming
  • Kieran Gallagher - Programming
